35#include <sys/cdefs.h>
36__RCSID("$NetBSD: pppcrypt.c,v 1.4 2014/10/25 21:11:37 christos Exp $");
37
38#include <errno.h>
39#include <stdlib.h>
40#include <unistd.h>
41#include "pppd.h"
42#include "pppcrypt.h"
43
44static u_char
45Get7Bits(u_char *input, int startBit)
46{
47 unsigned int word;
48
49 word = (unsigned)input[startBit / 8] << 8;
50 word |= (unsigned)input[startBit / 8 + 1];
51
52 word >>= 15 - (startBit % 8 + 7);
53
54 return word & 0xFE;
55}
56
57static void
58MakeKey(
59u_char *key, /* IN 56 bit DES key missing parity bits */
60u_char *des_key /* OUT 64 bit DES key with parity bits added */
61)
62{
63 des_key[0] = Get7Bits(key, 0);
64 des_key[1] = Get7Bits(key, 7);
65 des_key[2] = Get7Bits(key, 14);
66 des_key[3] = Get7Bits(key, 21);
67 des_key[4] = Get7Bits(key, 28);
68 des_key[5] = Get7Bits(key, 35);
69 des_key[6] = Get7Bits(key, 42);
70 des_key[7] = Get7Bits(key, 49);
71
72#ifndef USE_CRYPT
73 des_set_odd_parity((des_cblock *)des_key);
74#endif
75}
76
77#ifdef USE_CRYPT
78/*
79 * in == 8-byte string (expanded version of the 56-bit key)
80 * out == 64-byte string where each byte is either 1 or 0
81 * Note that the low-order "bit" is always ignored by by setkey()
82 */
83static void
84Expand(u_char *in, u_char *out)
85{
86 int j, c;
87 int i;
88
89 for (i = 0; i < 64; in++){
90 c = *in;
91 for (j = 7; j >= 0; j--)
92 *out++ = (c >> j) & 01;
93 i += 8;
94 }
95}
96
97/* The inverse of Expand
98 */
99static void
100Collapse(u_char *in, u_char *out)
101{
102 int j;
103 int i;
104 unsigned int c;
105
106 for (i = 0; i < 64; i += 8, out++) {
107 c = 0;
108 for (j = 7; j >= 0; j--, in++)
109 c |= *in << j;
110 *out = c & 0xff;
111 }
112}
113
114bool
115DesSetkey(key)
116u_char *key;
117{
118 u_char des_key[8];
119 u_char crypt_key[66];
120
121 MakeKey(key, des_key);
122 Expand(des_key, crypt_key);
123 errno = 0;
124 setkey((const char *)crypt_key);
125 if (errno != 0)
126 return (0);
127 return (1);
128}
129
130bool
131DesEncrypt(clear, cipher)
132u_char *clear; /* IN 8 octets */
133u_char *cipher; /* OUT 8 octets */
134{
135 u_char des_input[66];
136
137 Expand(clear, des_input);
138 errno = 0;
139 encrypt((char *)des_input, 0);
140 if (errno != 0)
141 return (0);
142 Collapse(des_input, cipher);
143 return (1);
144}
145
146bool
147DesDecrypt(cipher, clear)
148u_char *cipher; /* IN 8 octets */
149u_char *clear; /* OUT 8 octets */
150{
151 u_char des_input[66];
152
153 Expand(cipher, des_input);
154 errno = 0;
155 encrypt((char *)des_input, 1);
156 if (errno != 0)
157 return (0);
158 Collapse(des_input, clear);
159 return (1);
160}
161
162#else /* USE_CRYPT */
163static des_key_schedule key_schedule;
164
165bool
166DesSetkey(key)
167u_char *key;
168{
169 des_cblock des_key;
170 MakeKey(key, des_key);
171 des_set_key(&des_key, key_schedule);
172 return (1);
173}
174
175bool
176DesEncrypt(clear, key, cipher)
177u_char *clear; /* IN 8 octets */
178u_char *cipher; /* OUT 8 octets */
179{
180 des_ecb_encrypt((des_cblock *)clear, (des_cblock *)cipher,
181 key_schedule, 1);
182 return (1);
183}
184
185bool
186DesDecrypt(cipher, clear)
187u_char *cipher; /* IN 8 octets */
188u_char *clear; /* OUT 8 octets */
189{
190 des_ecb_encrypt((des_cblock *)cipher, (des_cblock *)clear,
191 key_schedule, 0);
192 return (1);
193}
194
195#endif /* USE_CRYPT */
196
